name: Ariana Nasr
description:
Ariana is a captivating singer and multi-instrumentalist from Nova Scotia, now based in Montréal, who shares her passion for music through dynamic live performances. 

Accompanying herself on the chromatic button accordion, she presents a diverse repertoire that includes French chanson, world classics in various languages, jazz, blues, and the occasional classical aria.

Her musical path began in childhood, studying instruments such as saxophone, clarinet, and violin, and playing in jazz bands and wind ensembles. 

In 2015, after many years working in an original duo, her love of French chanson inspired her to create and tour an Édith Piaf tribute show, a project to which she still gives nods during her eclectic solo performances.

name: RoboJazz
description:
Mathieu Fiset is a versatile keyboardist and composer from Toronto, Canada, known for his eclectic mix of jazz fusion, progressive rock, funk, RnB, and electronic music. 

He started playing keyboards at a young age, coming from a musical family, and has since toured extensively, including performances in the United Arab Emirates, Southeast Asia, and China. 

His music blends complex jazz with electronic grooves, often drawing comparisons to artists like Chick Corea, Snarky Puppy and Daft Punk.

name: Bracia and Sestry Present: Andrzejki
description:
Join us for Andrzejki, St. Andrew's Feast, a night rooted in Slavic tradition, where the veil between present and future feels thin. Once known as an evening of magic, fortune telling, and love predictions, we're bringing our own take to this ritual gathering.

the evening will feature a live set by dark folk duo willow switch, fortune telling games hosted by Ania Paluch, and tarot readings offered by Andra Zlatescu. From time-honoured rituals like pouring hot wax through a key into cold water, to shared dinner, Wróżby, and music, it's a chance to step into mystery, connection, and possibility.

name: Up:Rising - Literary Anthology Book Launch
description:
Up:Rising is an unapologetic chorus of Mad voices that refuse to conform or cower in the shadows. This collection isn't about overcoming madness, it's about thriving with our madness, fully and fiercely, on our own terms.

We're thrilled to launch this collection of rebellious imaginings from authors with lived experience of mental health and addictions

Join us to meet the contributing writers and editors, hear live readings and take home your own signed copy.

For the second time in over three decades of supporting artists living with mental health issues and/or addictions, we are publishing a print literary anthology.

A virtual launch party will also be available for those that cannot attend in person.

name: Ontario Artisan Market - Holiday Edition! Two markets, one place

location.name: Evergreen Brick Works Winter location: TD Future Cities Centre

description:
Join us for a unique holiday shopping experience featuring some of the best artisan and vintage vendors in our city! The Ontario Artisan Market and The Ontario Vintage Market are coming together to create an unforgettable event.

Step into the beautiful CRH Gallery and City Builder's Gallery, where you will find a wonderland of unique, handmade gifts and treasures. With over 50 craft and maker vendors showcasing their products, along with more than 25 vintage vendors presenting a curated selection of one-of-a-kind vintage treasures, you'll discover something special for everyone on your list. Enjoy a new selection of vendors each week!

This holiday season, shop local, support small businesses, and enjoy a variety of fun activities for you, your friends, and your family, including:
- A food court to warm up with delicious meals
- A gift-wrapping station for that extra special touch
- Live music and more!

name: The Winter & Holiday Market at Evergreen Brick Works
description: Toronto's most exciting Winter Market is back at Evergreen Brick Works! This holiday season we've got four days of winter weekend fun on November 30, December 7, 14 & 21! We'll be hosting an artisan and vintage market featuring vintage clothing, handmade art and more from 60+ vendors. We'll also have a food court and food trucks selling mouth-watering food and drinks. And that's not all – you can also expect children's activities, a cozy winter garden, workshops, skating, live performances and so much more!

name: aniqa dear
description:
Toronto-based experimental art pop project rooted in queerness, diasporic identity, grief, and the eternal interplay between belonging and isolation. 

aniqa dear weaves her intricate melodic sensibilities with ever-shifting synth-infused textures and polyrhythms, resulting in danceable music interlaced with stark vulnerability. 

With influences ranging from Arabic pop, Bollywood and jazz to the avant-garde, her music is striking and heady, incisive and heavy. She asks intently if you have ever danced into your own abyss, and she invites you in.

name: Ethnosonic Debut Album Release Concert
description:
Founded in March 2024 by composer Aslan Gotov, bassist Viktor Khomenko, and duduk player Sar Kamler, this eight-piece ensemble has taken Toronto by storm with their masterful fusion of
Circassian, Armenian, Ukrainian, and Balkan folk traditions with contemporary jazz and funk. 

At the heart of their sound lies Kamler's haunting Armenian duduk, a UNESCO-recognized ancient woodwind that serves as a bridge between musical worlds.

The proof of their impact speaks for itself: two completely sold-out concerts in 2025 alone, including their "Duduk, Jazz and Winter Nights" performance at City Playhouse Theatre and their intimate "Sunset Serenade" at Harmony Hall. 

Recognition followed with a prestigious Ontario Arts Council grant supporting their debut album creation.

name: Ontario Vintage Market - Holiday Edition! Two markets, one place

location.name: Evergreen Brick Works Winter location: TD Future Cities Centre

description:
Join us for a unique holiday shopping experience featuring some of the best artisan and vintage vendors in our city! The Ontario Artisan Market and The Ontario Vintage Market are coming together to create an unforgettable event.

Step into the beautiful CRH Gallery and City Builder's Gallery, where you will find a wonderland of unique, handmade gifts and treasures. With over 50 craft and maker vendors showcasing their products, along with more than 25 vintage vendors presenting a curated selection of one-of-a-kind vintage treasures, you'll discover something special for everyone on your list. Enjoy a new selection of vendors each week!

This holiday season, shop local, support small businesses, and enjoy a variety of fun activities for you, your friends, and your family, including:
- A food court to warm up with delicious meals
- A gift-wrapping station for that extra special touch
- Live music and more!

name: Loch Ontario
description:
Now a staple on the Toronto music scene, Loch Ontario brings you a joyful and boisterous, sometimes psychedelic, brew of songs and tunes hailing from the wide folk traditions of Scotland, Ireland, Brittany, Cape Breton, and Québec, not shying away from mixing the best qualities of each musical language as they intermingle. 

Deep celtic melodies, harmonies, and rhythms are woven in such a way as to take you on a journey, making sure friends are met and stories are told along the way. Welcome to our kitchen party!

name: Oneness Gathering
description:
Toronto spiritual seekers and finders!

You're invited to join a warm, vibrant community dedicated to awakening the higher self.

Led by spiritual teacher Stephen D'Amico, these gatherings feature guided meditation, teachings, conscious dialogue, and powerful energetic transmissions that accelerate inner growth.

Come share in the energy field of pure being with others. Experience clarity and connection as you explore true self-awareness. And leave feeling more deeply present and grounded in your authentic being.

name: Wintour Wonderland Drag Brunch
description:
Brrr, baby. 

As seen on Crave TV's "Drag Brunch Saved My Life", join Anoush Ellah and Ava Dia Max to brunch the blues away with cool couture and hot performances.
